definition[0]: to move information or programs from a computer network to a small computer
example[0]: games that can be downloaded free from the Internet
definition[1]: a computer file or program that has been downloaded, or the process of downloading it
example[1]: We’ve got reviews and downloads of the latest business software.
definition[2]: to move computer software or information from one computer to another, usually from a large computer to a smaller one
example[2]: If you can log on to the network, you can download files from there.
example[3]: I downloaded the games from the Internet for free.
definition[3]: a computer program or file that has been downloaded, or the process of doing this
example[4]: You can get downloads of the nightly news from the BBC’s home page.
